Package lt.galdebar.monmonmvc.service

Class ShoppingItemService

  • java.lang.Object
    • lt.galdebar.monmonmvc.service.ShoppingItemService
  • @Service
public class ShoppingItemService
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles checks and verifications before shopping item CRUD operations.

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<ShoppingItemDTO> getAll()
        Gets all shopping items for current user and linked users (if there are any).
        Returns:
        List of Shopping items. Empty if nothing found.

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<ShoppingItemDTO> getAll​(UserDTO userDTO)
        Gets all shopping items when given a user.
        Parameters:
        userDTO - the user dto. Should contain valid email adress.
        Returns:
        List of Shopping Items. Empty if nothing found, or in any way incorrect email address given.

      • addItem

        @Transactional
public ShoppingItemDTO addItem​(ShoppingItemDTO shoppingItemDTO)
        Add a new Shopping item to DB. Assigns a category if there is none based on the item name. If there's no valid category to be found, assigns "Uncategorized"
        Parameters:
        shoppingItemDTO - the shopping item dto
        Returns:
        the saved Shopping item with assigned category and id.

      • updateItem

        @Transactional
public ShoppingItemDTO updateItem​(ShoppingItemDTO shoppingItemDTO)
                           throws ShoppingItemNotFound
        Update item shopping item dto. Carries all fields over. If fields are null or empty- item in DB will be updated accordingly.
        Parameters:
        shoppingItemDTO - the shopping item dto
        Returns:
        the shopping item dto
        Throws:
        ShoppingItemNotFound - the shopping item not found (invalid id)

      • updateItems

public java.util.List<ShoppingItemDTO> updateItems​(java.util.List<ShoppingItemDTO> shoppingItemDTOS)
                                            throws ShoppingItemNotFound
        Update items list.
        Parameters:
        shoppingItemDTOS - the shopping item dtos
        Returns:
        the list
        Throws:
        ShoppingItemNotFound - Any shopping item not found.
